name: Rockets & Night
description:
V1.0 Notes: CPU will randomly select a piece and move it to a random spot. It really has no strategy. Defeating the CPU will be quite simple. Take advantage of the the perfect information type game and play on a Zoom call or something!

HOW TO PLAY

Players take turns moving their pieces. First player to capture the opponent’s gem or to capture all of the opponent’s pieces is the winner.

HOW THE PIECES MOVE

Nights: These pieces may move in L-shapes and jump over other pieces.

Rockets: These pieces may move 2-spaces diagonally and jump over other pieces. Rockets transform into Walkers after moving.

Walkers: These pieces may move 1-space in any direction. Walkers transform
into Rockets after moving.
